    • bodyHasUnknownEncoding

      public static boolean bodyHasUnknownEncoding​(@Nonnull okhttp3.Headers headers)
      Parameters:
      headers - - okhttp headers multimap
      Returns:
      true if 'Content-Encoding' header is present and has no 'identity' or 'gzip' value
